title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 415.6 - Speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 415.6 - Speed limits

State Regulations
A rate of speed in excess of 30 miles per hour on a park
road or park drive, or in excess of 20 miles per hour in a parking field, by a
motor vehicle is prohibited, except as otherwise designated therefor by
sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
415.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
